ModulesÂ¶

This is a high level mapping of modules to functions. In LONI, a module calls a single executable/commandline function, and workflows are a series of modules. Modules are documented here to identify what script they call and links are provided back to the documentation of those functions.

LONI Module Name Underlying Function
BET FSL Brain Extraction Tool
FLIRT FSL Linear Registration
Parse B Parse B-values/vectors
Exract B0 Extract B0 Volume
Eddy Correct FSL Eddy Correction
Tensor Gen DTI Tensor Estimation
Fiber Gen Fiber Tractography
Fiber Convert Fiber Converter
Graph Gen Graph Generation
